title: SMC_GroupReadPositionInMovement (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_GroupReadPositionInMovement
Function block for reading the position in the current movement. The
result can be used for preparing a trigger using
SMC_GroupPrepareTrigger
by setting the
PositionType
to
MvtRelative
and the
Position.MvtPosition
to the
Position
output of this function block.
Note
If the position is read while blending between movements, then on the first
half of the blending the
MovementId
and
Position
will belong to the
first movement and on the second half, they will belong to the second
movement.
This is consistent with how trigger positions are handled when blending, but
in contrast to the behavior of the
Active
outputs of the movement command
FBs. The
Active
output of the second movement will become
TRUE
as
soon as the blending starts.

rows.Name: AxisGroup
rows.Comment: Reference to a group of axes

rows.Name: Enable
rows.Comment: The position is read continuously while enabled.

rows:
The current position within the current movement. The value
is between 0 and 1, where 0 is the start and 1 the end of the
movement.
The id of the current movement.
Signals that an error has occurred within the function block
